name: Overwhelmed VR
description:
Created for the NeuroGame Jam 17 
The first game jam in Portugal to bring together neuroscientists and game developers.

Overwhelmed is a VR experience made to test a subject reaction time and capability to perform simultaneous tasks under pressure.


It is both compatible with Oculus and Vive.


Created by:

  • David Filipe
  • Filipe Pedras
